about_the_game:
Dive deeper into the world of magic and mystery with the Twin Mind: The Deathly Trick DLC. Enjoy the full original game that introduces you to the famous twin detectives and their quest to solve the mysterious deaths of two prominent magicians. This expansion pack brings four additional locations filled with more mysteries, hidden objects, puzzles, and intriguing plot twists that will reveal new layers of the story and characters. Immerse yourself further into the lives of the twin detectives and uncover secrets that could change everything you thought you knew about the case!

In this thrilling DLC, you'll uncover hidden truths and solve perplexing puzzles that add richness to the main storyline. Each new location offers unique challenges and fascinating details about the characters, pushing the boundaries of your investigative skills.

👮 UNCOVER ETHAN'S SECRET!
Step into the magician's dressing room, a place brimming with mystique and secrets. Examine every detail, even the most insignificant objects. Piece together clues and solve the intricate puzzle of the magic trick to discover Ethan's hidden secret!

👮 FIND MORE EVIDENCE!
Delve into the archives of Edward's office, a labyrinth of documents and hidden information. Search through shelves of boxes and folders, scrutinizing each document to uncover vital secret information that could crack the case wide open!

👮 LEARN THE BACKSTORY OF THE MAGICIANS!
Wander through the magic museum, a treasure trove of history and mystery. Explore masks, photos of famous magicians, and play entertaining mini-games. Unveil the secrets and backstories of the magicians who once dazzled the world!

👮 FIND OUT WHY SARAH IS ATTACHED TO TYLER!
Explore Sarah's house, a place filled with memories and hidden truths. Understand the mysterious bond between her and Tyler. Is it mere human attachment or the result of a dark spell? Investigate thoroughly to find out the truth behind their connection!

With this DLC, experience more of the captivating narrative that Twin Mind: The Deathly Trick has to offer. Solve intricate puzzles designed to challenge your mind and uncover deeper secrets that will keep you on the edge of your seat!
